The range of a function is the difference between the maximum and minimum value.
In arithmetic sequence we have the following formula:
an=a1+(n−1)d where
a1 is the first term, an is the nth term, and d is the common difference.

Therefore, range will be an−a1, we just need to find a1 and an.
